name: twitchstreamers
description: A [freeCodeCamp](https://www.freecodecamp.com/) [challenge](https://www.freecodecamp.com/challenges/use-the-twitchtv-json-api), that get JSON from [Twitch API](https://dev.twitch.tv/docs/v5/reference/streams/#get-stream-by-user) built with: - HTML5 - CSS3 - BootStrap - JS   - jQuery   - Ajax   - JSON
author: Peter Vigh
